definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
to prepare herbal medicine by roasting or parching (in a pan)
to sauté/to fry/to dry by heating

sentences.english: A New Method for Measuring the Rifling Angle of Artillery Pipe Based on Template Matching .
sentences.chinese: 基于模板匹配的火炮身管膛线缠角测量技术研究。

sentences.english: The gyroscope in tank is used to stabilize the aim system of the gun.
sentences.chinese: 坦克中的陀螺仪用于稳定火炮的瞄准系统。

sentences.english: The UEF ACU can be upgraded with an artillery gun which is hidden in his chest.
sentences.chinese: UEF的指挥官可以升级隐藏在胸部内的火炮。

sentences.english: Revolutionary Troops Transporting Cannon to "Snake Hill", Whchang.
sentences.chinese: 起义部队已将火炮运到武昌蛇山上。

sentences.english: The 16th century, the city is also sacrifice in Spain early 1200s artillery.
sentences.chinese: 16世纪，这座古城也是牺牲在西班牙的火炮铁蹄下。

sentences.english: To use the artillery or air drop assets, a squad leader must request them.
sentences.chinese: 如果要使用火炮或者空投，需要小队长申请。

sentences.english: The gun on the turret could be swivelled once in a minute.
sentences.chinese: 炮塔的火炮可在一分钟内旋转一周。

sentences.english: The colonel ordered the soldiers to limber up.
sentences.chinese: 上校命令士兵们把火炮系在前车上。

sentences.english: SALVO FIRE is the simultaneous firing of all guns ready and aimed at the same target.
sentences.chinese: 齐射同口径火炮炮塔备便并同时瞄准射击同一目标。

sentences.english: The artillery is used within a C4ISR network at company or battalion level.
sentences.chinese: 火炮在一个C4ISR网络内在连或营层次使用。

sentences.english: Fire impact accuracy consists of two concepts of precision and density.
sentences.chinese: 火炮的射击命中精度包括准度和密集度两个概念。

sentences.english: The artillery crew is seated inside an armour-protected driving cab.
sentences.chinese: 火炮组员在装甲保护驾驶室内乘坐。

sentences.english: The vessels fired artillery shells and lobbed anti-submarine bombs into the wine-dark sea.
sentences.chinese: 暗色的海域里，战舰队发射火炮，投掷反潜炸弹。

sentences.english: In the night they were charged there by the Russian army and artillery.
sentences.chinese: 当天晚上他们遭到了露西亚军队和火炮的袭击。

sentences.english: They limbered up and set out.
sentences.chinese: 他们把火炮系在前车上后出发了。

sentences.english: The automatic mechanism is the key and difficult point of gun development.
sentences.chinese: 自动机是火炮研制的关键和难点之一。

definition: big gun/cannon/artillery/one who talks big/trad. form 大炮 also used/CL:門|门[men2],尊[zun1]
Western (or Western-style) cannon of the Ming era
firearms (in historical context)/flintlock (old powder and shot firearm)
to prepare herbal medicine by roasting or parching (in a pan)
to sauté/to fry/to dry by heating
